title: 我的世界1.7.10NEIMOD导致客户端崩溃
author: Back_Wheel
txt_content:
我是一个1.7.10服务器的腐竹，这次给客户端加入了NEI和NEI前置之后客户端便无法启动了，求大佬帮忙看看，以下是报错:
[15:23:02] [main/WARN]: The coremod codechicken.nei.asm.NEICorePlugin does not have a MCVersion annotation, it may cause issues with this version of Minecraft
[15:23:02] [main/ERROR]: An error occurred trying to configure the minecraft home at C:\Users\user\Desktop\MineSATE v1.0.7\.minecraft for Forge Mod Loader
Exception in thread "main"

replies.author: jfyddb
replies.txt_content: 加我QQmod的加了nei都会崩我有不蹦的2248500129

replies.author: Back_Wheel
replies.txt_content: 问题已修复，谢谢各位的帮忙

replies.author: Back_Wheel
replies.txt_content: 当我啥都没说，好像又有问题了
